issue.title: [JS] Use iterators instead of generators in critical code paths
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12303](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12303). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I found that generators are generally slower than iterators in most browsers. See [https://observablehq.com/@domoritz/yield-vs-iterator-vs-callback](https://observablehq.com/@domoritz/yield-vs-iterator-vs-callback). I attached the results for Chrome. We should consider using iterators instead of generators for iterating over row proxies and vectors.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12303?focusedCommentId=17319771) by Neal Richardson (npr):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9962
